messages.topic:
Need a better lsp-hover implementation!
Fortunately, kakoune supports markup!

messages.text:
After asking in <#C6LV2R5JB|vscode>, this is how LanguageServer.jl seems to auto-complete unicode characters <https://github.com/julia-vscode/LanguageServer.jl/blob/86a173de25b55430d950369bdbe3d82582e27778/src/requests/completions.jl#L69-L76>

It uses REPLCompletions.jl to do that, I think!
For the time being, <https://github.com/occivink/kakoune-snippets> or working on <https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/#|kitty>, seem to be the best options for this
(Note that kakoune has native kitty support with kitty-repl and send-text, like tmux. Plus kitty supports images in terminals, gpu acceleration and a neat interface for typing unicode characters)

attachments.fallback:
[February 21st, 2021 11:10 PM] pjentsch: I feel a bit silly asking this, but I'm having a lot of trouble getting kakoune to work. I did all the things in the LanguageServer.jl tutorial but I have no idea how the plugin system is supposed to work. This is the error:
```*** This is the debug buffer, where debug info will be written ***
/home/peterj/.config/kak/kakrc:no such command: 'plug'
/usr/share/kak/kakrc:29:1: 'evaluate-commands' 116:1: 'source' no such command: 'plug'
error while parsing kakrc:
    1:1: 'source' 29:1: 'evaluate-commands' 116:1: 'source' no such command: 'plug'```
